content.name: Trader Fix
content.description: This extension is an attempt to fix the on going and seeming ignored issues with the economy in X Rebirth by making the AI trade across gate instead of their clusters only.
content.author: Flying Space Drunks mod team

text.name: Trader Fix
text.description: Attempts to fix the non-Galactic Trader issue
text.author: flying Space Drunks mod team
